text: My name is Kris. Actually, it's Krzysztof but I've seen it misspelled in 2 thousand different ways. So, let's stick with Kris.
Writing was life-chaning for me. Every day around 4.30AM, I write in my gratitude Journal. But it all started with just an ordinary journal. [Add photos of journals + gratitude]
Books play a big role in my life
At the age of 32, I've become a Lifelong Learner
For 25 years I've been playing basketball
